required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Septal - Success Rate and Clinical Outcome of Septal Implant of Ventricular Defibrillation Lead
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of the Success Rate and the Clinical Evolution of a Ventricular Lead Implanted in the Septum Versus the Right Ventricular Apex.

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to determine the safety and efficacy of the implant of a ICD lead of defibrillation in the septum of the right ventricle

detailed_description.textblock: The rate of success at implant and the positive clinical outcomes for the patients implanted with a lead of defibrillation at the septal site would make it possible to recommend this site as a "new standard" for implant of the defibrillation lead in the RV for ICD.

primary_outcome.measure: Implant Success Rate at Septal Site
primary_outcome.description: Success of implant procedure: 1. implanted at the randomized site; 2. With electric criteria satisfied: pacing threshold < 1.5V, intrinsic amplitude >3 mV, impedance between 450 and 1800 Ω, shock impedance between 29 and 80 Ω and defibrillation at a maximum of 21J.

secondary_outcome.measure: - The Number of "Low Energy" Shocks (at 11 Joules), Efficient in the VT Zone, in the Population Programmed at This Recommended Value.
The Rate of ATP Success Therapy
secondary_outcome.description: in VT zone with at least one efficient ATP

secondary_outcome.measure: Spontaneous Episodes and Therapy Delivery - at Least One Appropriate Treatment
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Discharge, 3 Months, 6 Months, 12 Months, 36 Months, 60 Months

secondary_outcome.measure: Spontaneous Episodes and Therapy Delivery - at Least One Inappropriate Treatment
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Discharge, 3 Months, 6 Months, 12 Months, 36 Months, 60 Months

secondary_outcome.measure: Evolution of Left Ventricular Ejection Fraction
secondary_outcome.description: LVEF at 12 months and the change in LVEF at 12 months compared to implant (in %)

arm_group.description: RV lead is placed at mid septum.
RV lead is placed in apical position

intervention.description: Reliance G is a defibrillation lead to be placed in the right ventricle.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- ICD indication according to current Guidelines
Exclusion Criteria:
- Indication for cardiac resynchronisation therapy, absence of spontaneous ventricular rhythm, pacemaker dependency

group.title: Mid Septal Site Location
group.description: RV lead is placed at mid septum. Endotak Reliance G: Reliance G is a defibrillation lead to be placed in the right ventricle.

group.title: Apical Site Location
group.description: RV lead is placed in apical position Endotak Reliance G: Reliance G is a defibrillation lead to be placed in the right ventricle.

baseline.population: Intention to Treat with the Endotak Reliance G defibrillation lead - population.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: There is NOT an agreement between Principal Investigators and the Sponsor (or its agents) that restricts the PI's rights to discuss or publish trial results after the trial is completed.
